document_name: National strategy and action plan for Biodiversity 2018-2030
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUN/2018/TUN-2018-01-01-National strategy and action plan for Biodiversity 2018-2030_032c03ccd103a49e124518fe7dc71be9.pdf
document_description: This updated strategy sets Tunisia's vision to protect its diversity, notably from the adverse effects of climate change.
